The cave entrance is located 10-15„éû above sea level, and is surrounded by rocks. In 1976, local residents expanded a small lane in the middle of the main cave corridor to allow for easier exploration. Since then, the cave has continued to be explored and researched with great value for geologists. The cave was designated Natural Monument No. 260 in 1979. ## Intro | | | | - | - | |infocenter:|‚Ä¢ 1330 Travel Hotline: +82-2-1330

* Tickets can be purchased through the Maha-ri Eoreumchi Vilalge website only.| ## Detail Image ![/2022-10-21-1666338656222/2353727_image2_1.webp](/2022-10-21-1666338656222/2353727_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-10-21-1666338656222/2353729_image2_1.webp](/2022-10-21-1666338656222/2353729_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-10-21-1666338656222/2353730_image2_1.webp](/2022-10-21-1666338656222/2353730_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-10-21-1666338656222/2353732_image2_1.webp](/2022-10-21-1666338656222/2353732_image2_1.webp) ## Contact - [‚òéÔ∏è+82-33-560-2379](tel:+82335602379) - [üè†www.paleozoicgp.com](http://www.paleozoicgp.com/) ```googleMap latitude: 37.2779144274 longitude: 128.5770904015 title: 63, Munhui-gil, Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon-do ``` ## Directions [Bus]
From Dong Seoul Bus Terminal, take a bus to Pyeongchang Bus Terminal.
From Pyeongchang Bus Terminal Bus Stop, take a local bus bound for Baeknyong Cave and get off at Baeknyong Cave Bus Stop.

data.title: Baengnyongdonggul Cave-Gangwon Paleozoic Geopark (Î∞±Î£°ÎèôÍµ¥-Í∞ïÏõêÍ≥†ÏÉùÎåÄ Íµ≠Í∞ÄÏßÄÏßàÍ≥µÏõê)
data.description: Baengnyongdonggul Cave is a 1.8„éû-long, natural limestone cave located in Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon-do. The cave entrance is located 10-15„éû above sea level, and is surrounded by rocks. In 1976, local residents expanded a small lane in the middle of the main cave corridor to allow for easier exploration. Since then, the cave has continued to be explored and researched with great value for geologists. The cave was designated Natural Monument No. 260 in 1979.
data.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Hongcheon Hot Springs (ÌôçÏ≤úÏò®Ï≤úÏõêÌÉï)
dataList.description: Hongcheon Hot Springs has a great seaside view and the water at the springs contains a lot of alkali sodium bicarbonate that has a silky texture and is great for skin health. In addition, if people who suffer from hyperacidity drink this spring water, the water helps neutralizes stomach acid. It also is good for recovering from fatigue, neuralgia, rheumatoid arthritis, hypertension, allergy dermatitis, eczema chronicum, removing fat, healing skin cells, and anti-aging.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Gwaneumgul Cave (Daei-ri Cave Caverns) (Í¥ÄÏùåÍµ¥(ÏÇºÏ≤ô ÎåÄÏù¥Î¶¨ ÎèôÍµ¥ÏßÄÎåÄ))
dataList.description: Gwaneumgul Cave has a reputation of being a must-explore cave by not only Korean scientists but throughout cave academia around the world. The entrance of the cave is 4.2 meters wide, 3 meters high and 1.6 kilometers deep. The underground water flows from the entrance all the way to end all year long producing approximately 15,000 „é• per day. The cave also has 4 waterfalls along the way with the largest being 9 meters high. The cave is full of stalactites and stalagmites, as well as straw soda, columns, flowstones, cave corals, aragonite crystals and more. The cave has a total of 24 different types of living organisms, making a desirable cave for academic research.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Guryongpokpo Falls (Sogeumgang River) (Íµ¨Î£°Ìè≠Ìè¨ (ÏÜåÍ∏àÍ∞ï))
dataList.description: Guryongpokpo Falls refers to the group of nine waterfalls, varying in size, located over a three-kilometer stretch of Sogeumgang River in Odaesan National Park. Guryong means nine dragons and legend has it that each of the waterfalls was occupied by a dragon. The sixth waterfall is particularly attractive. It is simultaneously the most magnificent and serene of the falls, which is why it is also known as the Gentleman‚Äôs Waterfall. Two kilometers away from the sixth waterfall, is a curious-looking piece of rock called Manmulsang. The name literally means tens of thousands of different looks. Some of these looks have earned it to other names such as Giant Rock, Phantom-Face Rock, Iworam, and Candlestick Rock‚Äô
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Gongjicheon Recreation Area (Í≥µÏßÄÏ≤úÏú†ÏõêÏßÄ)
dataList.description: The area of Gongjicheon Stream connected to the Bukhangang River is a shelter in the middle of Chuncheon City. This recreation area comprises various facilities along both sides of the Gongjicheon Stream, including Gongjicheon Sculpture Park, Uiam Park, Memorial Hall for Ethiopian Veterans in the Korean War, inline skating rink, outdoor stage, and fountain. Visitors can cross the water easily through the Gongjicheon Bridge and the lower pedestrian bridge. The waterside trail and the bike path are popular among citizens with the seasonal scenic view. In particular, cherry blossom attracts many visitors in spring. There is a bicycle rental stand nearby the stream. It is recommended to enjoy biking around the Gongjicheon Stream or along the Uiamho Bike Path. Another interesting ride is a pedal boat with which visitors can create a romantic memory with a splendid scenery of the Gongjicheon Stream.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Gangneung Coffee Street (Í∞ïÎ¶âÏª§ÌîºÍ±∞Î¶¨)
dataList.description: Gangneung in Gangwon-do is the first local district in Korea to host a coffee festival and support coffee artisans as well as promote development of coffee related facilities and contents such as a coffee museum, coffee street, coffee factory, barista academy, and more. With almost all coffee shops in the area roasting their own coffee beans, Gangneung is well-recognized as the city of coffee.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Gangmun Beach (Í∞ïÎ¨∏Ìï¥Î≥Ä)
dataList.description: Located in Gangmun-dong, Gangmun Beach is lined with fresh hoe (sliced raw fish) restaurants along Gangmunhang Port. The beach has accommodations nearby and is in close proximity to the Gyeongpo area, making it a great vacation destination. Not only is the beach a well-known diving spot among scuba divers for its deep waters and abundant marine life, but its dock is also popular among fishers all year round.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Daegwallyeong Samyang Farm (ÎåÄÍ¥ÄÎ†π ÏÇºÏñëÎ™©Ïû•)
dataList.description: Daegwallyeong Samyang Farm is a livestock farm opened in 1972 to source product for Samyang Food, then opened as a tourist attraction in 2007 making it open to the public. The animals are free to roam the large ranch fields and the wind generator on top of the hill is the largest in Korea to create natural energy. At the farm, visitors can take in the beautiful scenery, watch a sheep herding performance, feed sheep and ostrich, and so much more. There are various Samyang products sold at the ranch mart as well as organic milk products to try as well.
dataList.author: korea-tour
